data.text: @Azcargo1962 @tomlins_amanda @Imonlyslightly @maggie_erewash @UKHSA @kidneycareuk @UKKidney @MHRAgovuk The language is very vague & depending on how you interpret 'health authorities' may contradict what MHRA said in their email to me. Hence, the only people to really know are those making decisions at DHSC - hence the FOI request regarding their decision making & evidence used.
@tomlins_amanda @Imonlyslightly @GlennRSmithPhD @maggie_erewash @UKHSA @kidneycareuk @UKKidney @MHRAgovuk I see what you mean now! I’ve asked them has it been submitted so will let you know.

@Imonlyslightly @Azcargo1962 @GlennRSmithPhD @maggie_erewash @UKHSA @kidneycareuk @UKKidney @MHRAgovuk Not especially helpful is it  - hard for clinicians to prescribe a drug that hasn’t even been authorised yet (not as if ‘off label’ helps in this situation!)! Buck passing all around.

@Azcargo1962 @Imonlyslightly @GlennRSmithPhD @maggie_erewash @UKHSA @kidneycareuk @UKKidney @MHRAgovuk The FOI to MHRA, that Glenn got a response to, seems to suggest that AZ have not sumbmitted it for approval?!
@tomlins_amanda @Imonlyslightly @GlennRSmithPhD @maggie_erewash @UKHSA @kidneycareuk @UKKidney @MHRAgovuk Sounds like it has been submitted.The FOI from the @MHRAgovuk will be interesting now…..

@tomlins_amanda @Azcargo1962 @GlennRSmithPhD @maggie_erewash @UKHSA @kidneycareuk @UKKidney @MHRAgovuk It means little. There is also a tendency to pass the buck to specialists. As in advising you to follow specialists' advice in a world created where you can't follow it safely. Looks like they are doing something while doing nothing.

@Azcargo1962 @Imonlyslightly @GlennRSmithPhD @maggie_erewash @UKHSA @kidneycareuk @UKKidney @MHRAgovuk Thanks Tony. Clear as mud then! A bit of word salad. I’m unclear as to whether or not AZ have actually submitted it for MHRA approval or not - what do you reas between the lines?

@tomlins_amanda @Imonlyslightly @GlennRSmithPhD @maggie_erewash @UKHSA @kidneycareuk @UKKidney @MHRAgovuk Morning all,
I’ve just had a response from AstraZenica. https://t.co/AzieY7l99W
@maggie_erewash @UKHSA But without the free testing program you're not going to have much information to go on. Without the need to self isolate people won't pay for tests.
